item.title: HTML5 Articles and Sections
item.description: Having trouble deciding whether to use a div, section or article in your HTML5 page? Oli Studholme has a great article explaining how they should be used and provides a very simple method for deciding which to use. To decide which of these three elements is appropriate, choose the first suitable option: 1. Would the enclosed content would make sense on itâ€™s own in a feed reader? If so use 2.
